description: Enterprise techniques used by Leafminer, ATT&CK group G0077 v1.0
name: Leafminer (G0077)

techniques.comment: [Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used a tool called Imecab to set up a persistent remote access account on the victim machine.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used a tool called MailSniper to search for files on the desktop and another utility called Sobolsoft to extract attachments from EML files.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used a tool called Imecab to set up a persistent remote access account on the victim machine.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used a tool called MailSniper to search through the Exchange server mailboxes for keywords.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used a tool called BruteForcer to perform a brute force attack.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) has infected victims using watering holes.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) scanned network services to search for vulnerabilities in the victim system.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used several tools for retrieving login and password information.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) obfuscated scripts that were used on victim machines.
[Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) used Microsoft’s Sysinternals tools to gather detailed information about remote systems.
